title: [WTFast] HELP [OCE]
body:
OK So... I Get Around 350 Ping.. Which Is Really Bad... Im From India...
I Used To Play Around 6 Months Ago.. I Used WTFast And My Ping Dropped To Around 240.. I Used To Play With South-East Asia or Singapore Servers...
What I Used To Do Was.. Click Play In Client.. Launch WTFast... Select Servers.. Then Login... It Used To Work Everytime...

But Now I Started Playing Again... I Did The Same Thing... But Now None Servers Work... Only Australia Works Which Gives Me The Same 350 Ping.. So No Use... Every Other Server Like SE Asia or Singapore Shows Black Screen And Firewall Even When Firewall is Disabled...
I Run As Admin Everything... And Also Added Firewall Exception...
If I Start The Client WIth WTFast... I Cant Select A Champ or Sometimes Not Login..

Please Help Me Here... If Anyone Uses WTFast From Asia [or INDIA]...  Please Tell Me... Tell Me How It Works For You... I Mean How Do You Start It.. When Do You Start IT... Please Explain How You Use WTFast...

THANKS... I REALLY APPRECIATE YOUR HELP

replies.body:
ok... sorted it out... thnx for the reply....
and we cant use WTFast?? really?? will i get banned??

Firstly, it's against the EULA for you to be using a proxy to play this game, so there is no official support to help you out here. Secondly, proxies do have a reputation for abandoning maintenance for a connection to a particular port, so it might be their fault, in which you'll have to bring it up with them.

Have you tried starting up WTFast before even logging into League?
